news_header: Beyoncé supports Kamala Harris at a campaign event in Texas.
news_text: Singer Beyoncé has endorsed presidential candidate Kamala Harris at an election event in Houston, Texas, urging for a 'new song' in politics. Harris emphasized women's abortion rights in a state where Republicans have banned the procedure. Meanwhile, Republican candidate Donald Trump was campaigning in Austin, Texas, but arrived three hours late for an interview.
